DataElement.preferredName: Treating Site Therapeutic Equipment Ability Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that are related to the ability of a healthcare facility to perform therapeutic activities as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Treating Site Diagnostic, Therapeutic, or Research Equipment Ability Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any healthcare facility where care is provided as part of a cooperative group._A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities._The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any healthcare facility where care is provided as part of a cooperative group.

Concepts.definition: Any healthcare facility where care is provided as part of a cooperative group.

Property.preferredName: Diagnostic, Therapeutic, or Research Equipment Ability Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities.:The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities.
The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: The Centre has the ability to
ReferenceDocuments.description: The Centre has the ability to treat patients with either a Gamma Knife, Cyberkinfe, or a linear accelerator-based radiosurgery system.
